+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|              Function              |                      Function Args                      |                 Handler Function Args                  |                                                  Description                                                                        |
+====================================+=========================================================+========================================================+=====================================================================================================================================+
|        GMFSetOnClickHandler        |                   ``@ref::rFunction``                   | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On left click of mouse, for any tile ID                                                                                             |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|        GMFSetOnOpenHandler         |                   ``@ref::rFunction``                   |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On open of a generic menu, for any tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering              |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|        GMFSetOnCloseHandler        |                   ``@ref::rFunction``                   |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On close of a generic menu, for any tile ID                                                                                         |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|      GMFSetOnMouseoverHandler      |                   ``@ref::rFunction``                   | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On mouseover of a tile, for any tile ID                                                                                             |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                         By Menu Type                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|     GMFSetByMenuOnClickHandler     |        ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iMenuType``         | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On left click of mouse on a tile in a specific menu type, for any tile ID                                                           |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|     GMFSetByMenuOnOpenHandler      |        ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iMenuType``         |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On open of a specific menu type, for any tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering        |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|     GMFSetByMenuOnCloseHandler     |        ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iMenuType``         |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On close of a specific menu type, for any tile ID                                                                                   |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   GMFSetByMenuOnMouseoverHandler   |        ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iMenuType``         | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On mouseover of a tile in a specific menu type, for any tile ID                                                                     |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                          By Tile ID                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|      GMFSetOnClickByIdHandler      |           ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``            | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On left click of mouse, for a specific tile ID                                                                                      |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|      GMFSetOnOpenByIdHandler       |           ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``            |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On open of a generic menu, for a specific tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering       |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|      GMFSetOnCloseByIdHandler      |           ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``            |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On close of a generic menu, for a specific tile ID                                                                                  |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|    GMFSetOnMouseoverByIdHandler    |   ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID`` , ``@int::iID``    | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On mouseover of a tile, for a specific tile ID                                                                                      |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                   By Menu Type and Tile ID                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   GMFSetByMenuOnClickByIdHandler   | ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``, ``@int::iMenuType`` | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On left click of mouse on a tile in a specific menu type, for a specific tile ID                                                    |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   GMFSetByMenuOnOpenByIdHandler    | ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``, ``@int::iMenuType`` |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On open of a specific menu type, for a specific tile ID. Note that this function will run before most of the menu is done rendering |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   GMFSetByMenuOnCloseByIdHandler   | ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``, ``@int::iMenuType`` |                  ``@int::iMenuType``                   | On close of a specific menu type, for a specific tile ID                                                                            |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| GMFSetByMenuOnMouseoverByIdHandler | ``@ref::rFunction``, ``@int::iID``, ``@int::iMenuType`` | ``@int::iMenuType``, ``@string::sTile``, ``@int::iID`` | On mouseover of a tile in a specific menu type, for a specific tile ID                                                              |
+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
